Computer.name: Spiderbenb's Laptop
Computer.file: The world need people to help it from itself, we're dying slowly, we're not going to live forever you know, we must end this quickly, we're not worth this planet.
This place is full of those, maybe we should check for it more often, How many people could be talking right now in this exact moment.
Forums are really dynamic, we should pay more attention at what could bring us, secrets, hints, anything is possible.
Computer.encryptedFile: A crew came together and were seen on the news, I've joined them and together we'll break the Inviolable Nodes. The Termination Crew will come soon.
